page.title: 20Mrs.Giles
page.content: Today we went to interview Mrs.Giles. She told us a lot of interesting things about Braybrooke that I didn't know.Mrs Giles said that there used to be a slaughter house in Braybrooke down Green Lane owned by Mr.Abbott (Stan). Next to the shop there used to be a row of cottages.Also,the Busby's house,that used to be 2 cottages.Next to the church there used to be a Green where the children played.In the olden days around 1920 the children used to go to the cinema for 9 old pence.If she wanted pocket money she had to earn it and then she had to give some to her family.Mrs.Giles has lived in Bray- brooke for 69 years.She moved here when she was 18 months and lived in the teachers house in the original school. Mrs. Giles used to work at the village shop.
